results.title: Effect of metformin on sepsis-associated acute lung injury and gut microbiota in aged rats with sepsis
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment reversed the pathological changes including @DISEASE_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055370 @@@lung tissue damage@@@, @DISEASE_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D006470 @@@hemorrhage@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@edema@@@ in aged @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with CLP-induced @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@.

results.title: Antidiabetic drug metformin disrupts the embryogenesis in zebrafish through an oxidative stress mechanism.
results.text_hl: Antidiabetic drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ disrupts the embryogenesis in @SPECIES_7955 @@@zebrafish@@@ through an oxidative stress mechanism.

results.title: Protective Effect of Metformin on Sepsis Myocarditis in Zebrafish
results.text_hl: Pretreatment with 10 mM @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for 3 hours could effectively reduce @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart congestion@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@swelling@@@ in @SPECIES_7955 @@@zebrafish@@@ with @DISEASE_Myocarditis @DISEASE_MESH:D009205 @@@sepsis myocarditis@@@ and increased the heart rate.

results.title: Metformin effect in models of inflammation is associated with activation of ATP-dependent potassium channels and inhibition of tumor necrosis factor-alpha production.

results.title: Metformin and omega-3 fish oil elicit anti-inflammatory effects via modulation of some dysregulated micro RNAs expression and signaling pathways in experimental induced arthritis.
results.text_hl: RESULTS AND CONCLUSION: All drug treatments amended the arthrogram score and hind paw @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@swelling@@@ as well as decreased serum @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@tumor necrosis factor (TNF)-alpha@@@ and @GENE_IL1B @GENE_24494 @@@interleukin (IL)-1beta@@@ levels.

results.title: Protective Effect of Metformin against Acute Inflammation and Oxidative Stress in Rat.
results.text_hl: The present study was carried out to evaluate the efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in ameliorating @<m>DISEASE_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@edema@@@ formation, oxidative stress, mediator release and vascular changes associated with @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@acute inflammation@@@ in the @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ @CHEMICAL_Carrageenan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002351 @@@carrageenan@@@ model.
